sentence.Network_en: Widespread political and economic disarray threatens to make the constitution meaningless.
sentence.Network_cn: 四处蔓延的政治和经济混乱可能会使宪法变得可有可无。

sentence.Network_en: Washington has been abuzz with stories about disarray inside the White House.
sentence.Network_cn: 整个华盛顿都对白宫内发生的混乱议论纷纷。

sentence.Network_en: The peace talks broke up in disarray .

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《Friends》词汇表B ... moans n. 呻吟, 哀悼, 呼啸 disarray v. 混乱 walker n. 徒步者, 常散步的人, 参加竞走者.
雅思英语完整版_馆档网 ... disable 使无能力，使伤残 disarray 弄乱，扰乱 disaster 灾难，祸患.
GRE填空单词_百度文库 ... incise 切 disarray 杂乱 commensurate with 与。。。相当.
Mary and Max 《玛丽和马克思》全部台词 ... pass away: 去世 disarray: 无秩序 asymmetrical: 不匀称的.

list.abs: He rescued the 2002 Salt Lake City Winter Olympics disarray ., 他的出手解救使得 2002年的盐湖城冬季奥运会没有一团糟.
changing offices has left my papers in complete disarray ., 办公室搬迁 , 使我的文件全部乱了套了.
包含四... ... ◆ 封四[  back cover ] ◆ 横三竖四[ in disarray ] ◆ 吼三喝四[  yell in commanding and arrogant voice ].
adam.lambert 的《broken... ... information disarray 信息混乱 I dunno who I should believe in 我不知道应该相信谁.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French dissairay

entry.def: If people or things are in disarray, they are disorganized and confused.

example.ex: The nation is in disarray following rioting led by the military...
example.tran: 军队发动暴乱之后国家陷入混乱中。

example.ex: 12,000 crossed the border in one day alone, throwing evacuation plans into disarray...
example.tran: 仅一天中就有1.2万人越过边境，这使得撤退计划全被打乱了。

entry.def: If things or places are in disarray, they are in a very untidy state.

example.ex: She was left lying on her side and her clothes were in disarray...
example.tran: 发现她时她侧躺着，且衣衫不整。

example.ex: He found the room in disarray, with food dumped on the floor and drawers pulled open.
example.tran: 他发现屋里凌乱不堪，地上丢弃着食物，抽屉大开。

means.word_mean: 1. a mental state characterized by a lack of clear and orderly thought and behavior;

auth_sentence.content: I never saw her in any way in disarray.
auth_sentence.res_content: I never saw her in any way in disarray.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I never saw her in any way in disarray.

auth_sentence.content: So there will be enormous disarray on both sides.
auth_sentence.res_content: So there will be enormous disarray on both sides.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So there will be enormous disarray on both sides.

auth_sentence.content: In disarray is probably the only reasonable answer.
auth_sentence.res_content: In disarray is probably the only reasonable answer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In disarray is probably the only reasonable answer.

sentences.en: a period of disarray within the National Party
sentences.cn: 国家党內部的一段混乱时期

sentences.en: His personal life fell into disarray when his wife left him.
sentences.cn: 妻子离去后，他的个人生活一片混乱。

sentences.en: Our plans were thrown into disarray by the rail strike.
sentences.cn: 铁路罢工打乱了我们的计划。
